00038 #ifndef QTEXTEDIT_H
00039 #define QTEXTEDIT_H

00050 // This class is out of the Qt3 namespace on purpose : it will make code
00051 // more easy to port to Qt 3. The other classes are inside Qt3 because otherwise
00052 // they would conflict with Qt 2.
00053 class Q_EXPORT QTextEdit : public Qt3::QTextView
00054 {
00055     Q_OBJECT
00056     Q_PROPERTY( int undoDepth READ undoDepth WRITE setUndoDepth )
00057     Q_PROPERTY( bool overWriteMode READ isOverwriteMode WRITE setOverwriteMode )
00058 
00059 public:
00060     QTextEdit(QWidget *parent = 0, const char *name = 0 );
00061     ~QTextEdit();
00062 
00063     void getCursorPosition( int &parag, int &index ) const;
00064     bool isModified() const;
00065     bool italic() const;
00066     bool bold() const;
00067     bool underline() const;
00068     QString family() const;
00069     int pointSize() const;
00070     QColor color() const;
00071     QFont font() const;
00072     int alignment() const;
00073     bool isOverwriteMode() const;
00074     int undoDepth() const;
00075     virtual void insert( const QString &text, bool indent = FALSE, bool checkNewLine = TRUE, bool removeSelected = TRUE );
00076     virtual bool getFormat( int parag, int index, QFont &font, QColor &color );
00077 
00078 public slots:
00079     virtual void setOverwriteMode( bool b );
00080     virtual void undo();
00081     virtual void redo();
00082     virtual void cut();
00083     virtual void paste();
00084     virtual void pasteSubType( const QCString &subtype );
00085     virtual void clear();
00086     virtual void del();
00087     virtual void indent();
00088     virtual void setItalic( bool b );
00089     virtual void setBold( bool b );
00090     virtual void setUnderline( bool b );
00091     virtual void setFamily( const QString &f );
00092     virtual void setPointSize( int s );
00093     virtual void setColor( const QColor &c );
00094     virtual void setFont( const QFont &f );
00095     virtual void setAlignment( int a );
00096     virtual void setParagType( Qt3::QStyleSheetItem::DisplayMode dm, Qt3::QStyleSheetItem::ListStyle listStyle );
00097     virtual void setCursorPosition( int parag, int index );
00098     virtual void setSelection( int parag_from, int index_from, int parag_to, int index_to, int selNum = 0 );
00099     virtual void setSelectionAttributes( int selNum, const QColor &back, bool invertText );
00100     virtual void setModified( bool m );
00101     virtual void resetFormat();
00102     virtual void setUndoDepth( int d );
00103     virtual void removeSelectedText();
00104 
00105 signals:
00106     void undoAvailable( bool yes );
00107     void redoAvailable( bool yes );
00108     void currentFontChanged( const QFont &f );
00109     void currentColorChanged( const QColor &c );
00110     void currentAlignmentChanged( int a );
00111     void cursorPositionChanged( Qt3::QTextCursor *c );
00112     void returnPressed();
00113     void modificationChanged( bool m );
00114 
00115 protected:
00116     enum KeyboardAction { // keep in sync with QTextView
00117     ActionBackspace,
00118     ActionDelete,
00119     ActionReturn,
00120     ActionKill
00121     };
00122 
00123     enum MoveDirection { // keep in sync with QTextView
00124     MoveLeft,
00125     MoveRight,
00126     MoveUp,
00127     MoveDown,
00128     MoveHome,
00129     MoveEnd,
00130     MovePgUp,
00131     MovePgDown
00132     };
00133 
00134     void setFormat( Qt3::QTextFormat *f, int flags );
00135     void ensureCursorVisible();
00136     void placeCursor( const QPoint &pos, Qt3::QTextCursor *c = 0 );
00137     void moveCursor( MoveDirection direction, bool shift, bool control );
00138     void moveCursor( MoveDirection direction, bool control );
00139     void doKeyboardAction( KeyboardAction action );
00140     Qt3::QTextCursor *textCursor() const;
00141 
00142 private:
00143     bool isReadOnly() const { return FALSE; }
00144     void emitUndoAvailable( bool b ) { emit undoAvailable( b ); }
00145     void emitRedoAvailable( bool b ) { emit redoAvailable( b ); }
00146     void emitCurrentFontChanged( const QFont &f ) { emit currentFontChanged( f ); }
00147     void emitCurrentColorChanged( const QColor &c ) { emit currentColorChanged( c ); }
00148     void emitCurrentAlignmentChanged( int a ) { emit currentAlignmentChanged( a ); }
00149     void emitCursorPositionChanged( Qt3::QTextCursor *c ) { emit cursorPositionChanged( c ); }
00150     void emitReturnPressed() { emit returnPressed(); }
00151     void emitModificationChanged( bool m ) { emit modificationChanged( m ); }
00152 
00153 private:    // Disabled copy constructor and operator=
00154 #if defined(Q_DISABLE_COPY)
00155     QTextEdit( const QTextEdit & );
00156     QTextEdit& operator=( const QTextEdit & );
00157 #endif
00158 };
